task.title: Import TMX File

context.p: You can populate translation memories with data from TMX files. Use this feature if you have legacy TM data that you want to reuse in Fluenta.

step.cmd: In Memories view, select the translation memory that will receive the imported data.
In main menu, select Memories Import TMX File or click the Import TMX File button in the Memories view toolbar.
step.stepresult: The following dialog appears: Import TMX File dialog

step.cmd: Type the name of the TMX file to import in the TMX File text box or use the Browse... button next to it to select a TMX file from the file system.
Click the Import TMX File button.

taskbody.result: The TMX file is imported into the selected translation memory.
